projects.title: Standardization
projects.description: We investigated how standardization in customer support influences customer satisfaction while considering different factors which can mitigate or magnify this effect. Our analytical approach includes OLS regression as a baseline model, further extended to account for confounding variables, moderator and mediator effects, industry-specific trends and language patterns in responses.

projects.title: Words Generator
projects.description: Collection of neural networks trained on different corpora of existing words to make them capable of generating novel, non-existent words possessing a striking resemblance to real ones. The final model has been deployed through a user-interactive and free-access web-app.

projects.title: F1 Race Analysis
projects.tags: Python, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Mining
projects.description: Interactive application to display statistics and insights from the first ever to the most recent Formula 1 Grand Prix, automatically updated after each race.

projects.title: House Price Predictor
projects.tags: Python, Random Forest Regressor, Neural Network, Linear Regression
projects.description: As a ML challenge at university, I developed, trained and tested different machine learning models to predict the price of several houses in Milan, Rome and Venice (45k +). The best performing model has been deployed through a free-access web app.

projects.title: Production Function Estimation
projects.tags: R, Panel Data Analysis, FE/RE Model
projects.description: My group and I applied Panel Data Analysis tools, such as the Fixed Effect (FE) and Random Effect (RE) models to identify individual and time specific latent heterogeneity and provide a statistically relevant estimation of the production function of a firm.

projects.title: Taylor Rule Estimation by OLS
projects.description: My group and I estimated Austria’s interest rate through the application of Ordinary Least Squares Linear Regression and the insights provided by Taylor’s rule. We retrieved the data related to the macroeconomics indicators needed and successfully estimated the target variable, carefully performing diagnostic checks on the obtained results to ensure robustness and accuracy.
